entry.title: Tarzine of the APAs
entry.summary:
Tarzine of the APAs Volume 1

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.1 #4 1975-09-25 in APA-L 541

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.1 #5 1975-10-02 in APA-L 543

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.1 #6 1975-10-16 in APA-L 544

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.1 #10 1975-11-13 in APA-L 549

Most of the Vol. 1 is missing. Check APA-L 530-552.

Tarzine of the APAs Volume 2

Vol.2 #1 is missing. Check SCAPA FLOW 12-13

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.2 #2 1980-10-28 in SCAPA FLOW

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.2 #3 1981-01-29 in SCAPA FLOW 14

The rest of the Vol. 2 is missing. Check SCAPA FLOW after 14.

Tarzine of the APAs Volume 3

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.3 #1 1987-03-19 in APA-L 1140

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.3 #2 1987-03-24 in APA-L 1141

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.3 #3 1987-04-02 in APA-L 1142

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.3 #4 1987-04-09 in APA-L 1144

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.3 #5 1987-04-16 in APA-L 1144

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.3 #6 1987-04-30 in APA-L 1147

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.3 #7 1987-09-24 in APA-L 1167

Tarzine of the APAs Vol.3 #8 1987-10-01 in APA-L 1167

Donâ€™t know for sure were there anything else or not.
